title: Blazer
description: Fitted blazer in woven fabric. One button at front, welt front pockets, and long sleeves with a covered button at cuffs. Vent at back. Lined.

title: Double-breasted Satin Blouse
description: Relaxed-fit, double-breasted blouse in satin with a printed pattern. Notched lapels, dropped shoulders, and long sleeves.

title: Oversized Denim Shirt
description: Oversized shirt in thick denim. Collar, buttons at front, and yoke at back with pleat. Chest pocket, long sleeves with buttons at cuffs, and a rounded hem.

title: Shirt with a Sheen
description: Relaxed-fit shirt in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Collar, buttons at front, and double-layered yoke at back with box pleat. Gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttons at cuffs. Rounded hem.

title: Sweatshirt Dress
description: Relaxed-fit, knee-length sweatshirt dress in cotton-blend fabric. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at neckline, cuffs, and hem.

title: Water-repellent Puffer Jacket
description: Quilted, padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent fabric. Drawstring hood, stand-up collar, and zipper at front with chin guard. Chest pocket with zipper, front pockets with zipper, and mesh inner pockets. Elasticized trim at cuffs and a concealed, elasticized drawstring at hem. Lined.

title: Rib-knit Hat
description: Soft, rib-knit hat with foldover cuff.

title: Relaxed Fit Printed T-shirt
description: Relaxed-fit T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a printed design. Crew neck.

title: Water-repellent Jacket
description: Padded jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric. Stand-up collar, zipper at front, diagonal welt side pockets, and an inner pocket with snap fastener. Ribbing at cuffs and elastic at hem. Lined.

title: Loose Fit Joggers
description: Loose-fit, lightweight sweatpant joggers. Covered elastic and concealed drawstring at waistband, side pockets, and a welt back pocket with concealed zipper and small appliqu√©. Elasticized drawstring at hems.

title: Linen King/Queen Duvet Cover Set
description: King/queen duvet cover set in soft, washed linen for comfortable sleep. Duvet cover fastens at foot end with concealed metal snap fasteners. Two pillowcases with envelope opening. Linen is a durable, long-lasting fabric which, with proper care, will become softer and more attractive with every wash. Linen bedding is a good choice for those who struggle with overheating, as the material absorbs moisture for a cool and comfortable sleeping environment. Thread count 104.

title: Cotton Storage Basket
description: Storage basket in thick, woven cotton fabric with two handles at top. Diameter 13 3/4 in. Height 11 in.

title: Large Patterned Glass Vase
description: Large, oval vase with an asymmetrical pattern of softly-shaped dots. Design and color of pattern may vary making each item unique. Inner diameter at top 3 1/4 in. Diameter at widest point 8 1/4 in. Height 11 3/4 in.

title: Waffled Bathrobe
description: Bathrobe in a soft, waffle-weave cotton blend with two front pockets and a tie belt at waist.

title: Cotton Velvet Cushion Cover
description: Cushion cover in cotton velvet with a concealed zip.

title: Belted Shirt Dress
description: Long-sleeved dress in woven cotton fabric with a printed pattern. Collar, buttons at upper front, yoke at back with box pleat, and belt at waist. Rounded hem, slightly longer at back.

title: Tulle-skirt Dress
description: Short-sleeved dress in textured jersey. Small opening at back of neck with button, waistband in glittery elastic, and a lined, voluminous skirt in multiple layers of shiny tulle.

title: Brushed-inside Joggers
description: Sweatpant joggers in heavy fabric with soft, brushed inside. Ribbed, elasticized waistband, side pockets, and ribbed hems.

title: Oversized Sibling Sweatshirt
description: Relaxed-fit sweatshirt in cotton-blend fabric with a puffy, printed text design. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at neckline, cuffs, and hem.

title: Sweatshirt
description: Comfy top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a soft brushed inside. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
